thread.title: AwoX expose au IBC2015, booth 4.C64 (Hall 4)

title: AwoX expose au IBC2015, booth 4.C64 (Hall 4)
text:
AwoX expose au IBC2015, booth 4.C64 (Hall 4) September 11, 2015 04:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time 
MONTPELLIER, France--( BUSINESS WIRE )-- Tous les documents du dossier de presse électronique sont accessibles à cette adresse: http://www.tradeshownews.com/events/ibc2015/awox/ Société: 
A propos de AwoX 
First IPO in the IoT field in Europe, AwoX offers products and software for smart home. AwoX delivers industry reference software for network connectivity, and is a strong actor in standards, Board Member of DLNA, Steering Member of UPnP, Platinum Member of OIC and Associate Member of Bluetooth. Since 2013, AwoX has been developing and selling its own range of connected objects available in three complementary Smart Home sectors: video, audio and lighting. With the recent acquisition of Cabasse, AwoX has reinforced its audio capabilities and its use cases offering. AwoX and Cabasse products are distributed in over 50 countries. AwoX products have been awarded the CES Innovations Design & Engineering Award. Contacts
